history.proof: qauto use: scal_opp_l, scal_zero_r, @plus_opp_l, scal_distr_l, @plus_reg_r unfold: Ring.AbelianGroup, AbelianGroup.sort, ModuleSpace.AbelianGroup.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K x : K u : V Unable to unify "AbelianGroup.plus ?M2435 ?M2436 ?M2437 (AbelianGroup.plus ?M2435 ?M2436 ?M2438 ?M2439) = AbelianGroup.plus ?M2435 ?M2436 (AbelianGroup.plus ?M2435 ?M2436 ?M2437 ?M2438) ?M2439" with "scal x (opp u) = opp (scal x u)".

original: intros x y z. apply AbelianGroup.ax2.
